title: Application to court
context: [ยง624D-6] Application to court. A motion to the court for a protective order or to enforce, quash, or modify a subpoena issued by a clerk of court under section 624D-3 shall comply with the rules of court and statutes of this State and be submitted to the court in the circuit in which discovery is to be conducted. [L 2012, c 17, pt of ยง1]
